about.address: 2 Pease Way, Newton Aycliffe, Co. Durham, DL5 5NH
about.hours:
| Day | Hours |
| --- | ----- |
Monday | 8.00am – 8.00pm 
Tuesday | 8.00am – 6.00pm 
Wednesday | 8.00am – 6.00pm & after 6.30pm by appointment 
Thursday | 8.00am – 6.00pm & after 6.30pm by appointment 
Friday | 8.00am – 6.00pm 
Weekend | closed except for a limited service on Saturday mornings (see below for more information).

We are open after 6.30pm on Wednesday and Thursday evenings.

On Wednesday there are a limited number of GP, Nurse and Health Care Assistant appointments for your convenience. This service is predominantly for patients who find it difficult to attend the surgery during normal opening hours.
On Thursday there is a late family Planning Clinic which has a Nurse Practitioner, a Nurse and an HCA with bookable appointments.
We are currently open on Saturday mornings to provide an 'Emergency' service for walk–in patients – although patients are recommended to call **111** in the first place. There are also a number of pre–bookable appointments with a GP or a nurse.
about.info: Peaseway Medical Centre is an NHS GP Practice offering the highest standards of personal care from a modern, purpose built property in the centre of Newton Aycliffe. The Practice Area covers Newton Aycliffe and an area with boundaries of Rushyford, Middridge, Heighington, Redworth, Aycliffe Village & Brafferton villages.

about.info:
Welcome to Willington Medical Group.

We aim to provide the highest standard of medical care possible with effective use of the resources allocated to us.

about.address: Hope Street, Crook, Co. Durham, DL15 9HU
about.info: We are a busy training practice looking after approximately 13,500 patients in and around the Crook area. Our patients have access to physiotherapy, counselling, coronary heart disease, diabetes and smoking cessation services all of which are held on the surgery premises. A full range of contraceptive services are also available. We have a newly formed Patient Representation Group who would welcome new members (details can be found in reception).

about.info:
NHS Durham Dales, Easington and Sedgefield Clinical Commissioning Group (DDES CCG) was authorised as a statutory body in February 2013.

We are made up 40 member GP practices and serve a population of around 272,000 spread across a large and diverse geographical area.

Clinical commissioning means that local GPs are using their knowledge about healthcare to develop services that meet patient needs.

about.address: Seaham Primary Care Centre, St Johns Square, Seaham, Co Durham, SR7 7JE
Front St, South Hetton, Co Durham, DH6 2TH
about.hours: | Day | Hours | | --- | ----- | Monday | 8am – 6pm Tuesday | 8am – 6pm Wednesday | 8am – 6pm Thursday | 8am – 6pm Friday | 8am – 6pm Saturday morning | You can now see a GP at Peterlee Health Centre, Bede way, Peterlee, SR9 1AD – no appointment necessary
about.info:
Silverdale Family Practice is a four partner practice looking after the health needs of the local area from within the health centre at South Hetton. We are proud of our record of ensuring patients receive the very best care and service possible.

Appointments can often be made to see a doctor or nurse on the same day, although as we always ensure we give priority to urgent cases this is not always possible. 

We welcome registrations from new patients residing within our catchment area which includes many of the local villages.

All of our patients have a named accountable GP, however patients are free to make appointments with and see whichever GP they wish.
You can book appointments, order repeat prescriptions and view summary information of your patient record online at www.silverdalefamilypractice.co.uk. Please register at reception if you would like to access this service.
about.before_website: Please see our website for more information on the practice
